name: 郭龍
objective:
介紹多媒體各項基礎技術，包括文字、圖像、影像、動畫與音訊，以及各項技術的整合應用。
This course introduces the elements of multimedia design, including text, graphics, video, animation, and audio, as well as the applications of the integration of those elements.
